entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62680
  • Regex UpdateBumpalong logic should be applicable to lazy loops as well #62677
    7.0.0
  • Regex UpdateBumpalong logic is flawed and likely costing us perf #62676
    7.0.0
  • Regex source generator can use {Last}IndexOf for strings in greedy char loop #62670
    7.0.0
  • Regex source generator can use IndexOf to speed up lazy loop #62669
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] `DebuggerTests.MiscTests.DebugLazyLoadedAssemblyWithEmbeddedPdb` timing out on CI #62667
  • [wasm] `DebuggerTests.ExceptionTests.ExceptionTestAllWithReload` failing on CI #62666
  • Change loop cloning to work with pre-header blocks #62665
    7.0.0
  • StressLogAnalyzer is failing to build #62664

Closed

  • File.SetLastWrite time fails on readonly files on Windows #62602
    7.0.0
  • Libraries 7.0 (master) cross build failed for tizen armel #62478
  • Test failure baseservices\\TieredCompilation\\BasicTestWithMcj\\BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #60381
  • Ignore composite images in Crossgen2 inputs #49247
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Performance/CodeQuality/Benchstones/BenchF/MatInv4/MatInv4/MatInv4.sh #61899
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Adds BitArray.CopyTo(Span<byte>) #62679
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Remove dummy project property IlasmRoundTrip #62678
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Make StressLogAnalyzer build disablable #62675
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move a few vendor libraries to src/native/external #62673
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #62668
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1508434 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Dedup addprefix & delete unused defines from cmake #62528
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Added missed penultimate bytes in `SniHelper_TruncatedData_Fails` scenario #62641
    area-System.Net.Security
  • HTTP/2: Improve incoming header performance #62614
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62638
    area-System.IO
  • Exclude DNNE based test project from armel builds #62486
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Update spmi asp.net script to collect some osr method contexts #62635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Skip native composite ReadyToRun images as inputs to Crossgen2 #62537
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Switch over Loader/classloader/TypeGeneratorTests to use merged wrappers #61942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • PE loader/image cleanups. No-copy mapping of R2R PEs on Windows. #61938
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Replace CorInfoIntrinsics with NamedIntrinsic #62639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • StreamReader sync/async optimizations: ArrayPool, IndexOfAny, ValueStringBuilder #62552
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • Reconfigure the field sequences for statics #62632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 4] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.FileExtensions` #57434
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Including FastFloat in parsing process #62301
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Stop marking volatile indirections as `NO_CSE` #62043
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Attempt to repro named mutex pal test issue #62655
    * NO MERGE *, area-PAL-coreclr
  • Improve String.Substring performance #62577
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Ini` #60368
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • API proposal implementation: DirectoryInfo.Copy / Directory.Copy #62375
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Cleanup, use camel case name conventions of method parameters #62633
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Add NativeAOT to build #62569
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Generalize loop pre-header creation and loop hoisting #62560
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Change all "unmanaged" (no GC fields) sequential types to have sequential layout. #61759
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [Draft] Make mono runtime tests stop using patching in CI; remove dependency on coreclr #62652
  • Pass HFA/HVA in registers #62623
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid deadlock with ConfigurationManager #62209
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Do not promote struct locals with holes #62645
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not perform vector save/restore around call that will never return #62662
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
